name: Our Dear Creators FunHouse
description:
An investigation broke out for the murders of three teenagers.

The murders took place in an old rundown house where a former resident, who asked to remain anonymous, used to live three years ago. The former resident was a world renowned inventor before a series of machine related accidents left them paralyzed from the neck down. This person has been taken into custody and is being questioned at this vey moment.

A short FNAF fan game 

Chapter 2 coming soon!!

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact
